about_the_game:
Little Bo Peep has lost her sheep, and now she's out for revenge! Play as Bo Peep in a single-player 3D action-RPG where she's overwhelmed with grief and goes on an adventure through Pastoria. Command a variety of sheep flocks for you to fight your way through hordes of fairy-tale creatures on a brutal revenge quest for the sake of all sheep and animals. Use your necromancy powers taught to you by your old mentor, Baba Yaga - It must be because of all of her evil ways that all of your sheep were killed! Battle, train and learn new abilities to gain an advantage on the big trolls, spitting flowers or kamikaze frogs! Earn their souls to upgrade your abilities and unlock new ways of fighting to fit your own playstyle, such as riding your sheep into battle! You must discover the unique aspects of the land, including solving puzzles, platforming or discovering the long lost skulls. Find Baba Yaga and let her know how much those sheep meant to you, though she might be more prepared than you think!

Construct your sheep into various shapes to help you on your quest.


Lift yourself to the sky by stacking sheep on top of one another.


Crash through walls with your Rams to solve puzzles and unlock cool secrets.


Cast a breeze of Fluffy Sheep into a vortex to overwhelm your enemies.


Launch your sheep at your enemies from a distance.


Collect Souls from your enemies to spend on upgrades for your abilities, or even unlock new ones!

short_description: Little Bo Peep's sleepiness has led to all of her sheep being killed! Take revenge using powers of necromancy to summon undead flocks of sheep to defeat your foes. Each different flock can assist in your movement or your battles to defeat your foes in an untold number of ways!
